Name: Beyond the Mind
About the game: Beyond the Mind - is a short relaxing game, where you need to solve riddles, exploring depths of mind. Also you will get a personal Oracle to solve your questions. - You can ask Oracle about everything (questions that can be answered yes or no) - Amazing relaxing soundtrack - Beautiful pictures - 10 riddles
